src:
Apa yang Perlu Dilakukan Barcelona untuk Juara UCL? Nelson Semedo Punya Jawabannya
05 Nov 2019, 09:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Nelson Semedo mengikuti jejak rekan-rekannya tentang menyuarakan hasrat Barcelona di Liga Champions. Dia mengakui Barca begitu merindukan trofi tersebut dan bakal berusaha melakukan segalanya untuk jadi juara.
Blaugrana hanya memiliki kenangan pahit di Liga Champions dalam dua musim terakhir. Kasusnya serupa, mereka membuang keunggulan besar di kandang hanya untuk takluk memalukan saat tandang di fase gugur.
Musim ini, Lionel Messi dkk. punya kesempatan memperbaiki kesalahan mereka. Barca bakal menjamu Slavia Praha pada matchday 4 Grup F Liga Champions 2019/20, Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari WIB nanti.
Laga ini penting untuk memastikan langkah ke putaran berikutnya. Baca komentar Semedo selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
What do Barcelona need to do for the UCL Champion? Nelson Semedo Has the Answer
05 Nov 2019, 09:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Nelson Semedo follows in the footsteps of his colleagues about voicing Barcelona's passion in the Champions League. He admitted Barca missed the trophy so much and would try to do everything to become a champion.
The Blaugrana only have bitter memories in the Champions League in the last two seasons. The case is similar, they throw away a big advantage at home only to be humiliated when away in the knockout phase.
This season, Lionel Messi et al. have a chance to correct their mistakes. Barca will host Slavia Prague on Matchday 4 Group F Champions League 2019/20, Wednesday (11/06/2019) early morning hrs later.
This match is important to ensure a step to the next round. Read the full Semedo comment below, Bolaneters!
